title: What were the Mutua Madrid Open results?
description: The 2025 Mutua Madrid Open began on Wednesday, when #NextGenATP Italian Federico Cina earned just the second tour-level victory of his career and Tour-veteran Gael Monfils became the oldest match winner in tournament history. View all the Madrid Day 1 results below. Results - Wednesday, 23 April 2025 Men's Singles - Round of 96 Nuno Borges (POR) d [WC] Pablo Carreno Busta (ESP) 67(7) 76(3) 63 Roberto Bautista Agut (ESP) d Jaume Munar (ESP) 64 26 63 Gael Monfils (FRA) d [Q] Borna Gojo (CRO) 16 62 64 Mariano Navone (ARG) d Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard (FRA) 64 64 Francisco Comesana (ARG) d Pedro Martinez (ESP) 64 64 Alexander Bublik (KAZ) d Alex Michelsen (USA) 76(2) 76(4) Flavio Cobolli (ITA) d Fabian Marozsan (HUN) 76(4) 75 [WC] Federico Cina (ITA) d [WC] Coleman Wong (HKG) 76(5) 61 Benjamin Bonzi (FRA) d [WC] Marin Cilic (CRO) 63 62 [Q] Ethan Quinn (USA) d [Q] Dusan Lajovic (SRB) 63 64 Laslo Djere (SRB) d [Q] Fabio Fognini (ITA) 62 63 [Q] Juan Manuel Cerundolo (ARG) d Aleksandar Kovacevic (USA) 36 75 62 Arthur Rinderknech (FRA) d Roman Safiullin 76(4) 61 Christopher O'Connell (AUS) d Camilo Ugo Carabelli (ARG) 63 64 [Q] Harold Mayot (FRA) d Corentin Moutet (FRA) 63 42 Retired Sebastian Ofner (AUT) d [Q] Hugo Gaston (FRA) 64 63 [NEWSLETTER FORM]
